import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import { getActivityById, deleteActivity } from '../../../actions' import Link from 'next/link' import Head from 'next/head' import auth0 from '../../../services/auth0' import Recommended from '../../../components/recommended' const DetailPage = (props) => { const router = useRouter() const { id } = router.query const { activity } = props const handleDelete = (id) => { deleteActivity(id).then(() => { router.push('/my-activities') }) } return ( <> {`${activity.name} - DiscoverDoo`}

router.back()}> BACK

) } export async function getServerSideProps({ query }) { const activity = await getActivityById(query.id) console.log(activity) return { props: {activity} } } export default DetailPage
